name: medplum-ci-cd-bots
description: Medplum CI/CD Bots Example - Demonstrating Code Reuse and Subscription Management
author: Medplum <hello@medplum.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && node --no-warnings esbuild-script.mjs
scripts.setup:bots: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/setup-bots-and-subscriptions.ts
scripts.deploy:bots: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/setup-bots-and-subscriptions.ts --deploy-only
